value:
$WmMPID_忍者イグレーヌ,ch02_23_Igrene_F_Ninja21,Face|For one who's so rarely seen without
a bow, you're skilled with a whole
host of weapons, Shamir.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者シャミア,ch17_34_Shamir_F_Ninja21,Face|Is that right? I do believe something
similar could be said of you, Igrene.$k$p$WmMPID_エリーゼ,ch05_19_Kamui_FF_Pair,Face|Hmm...$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|You've been completely focused on
watching Igrene and Shamir for long
enough, don't you think? ...Elise?$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|We're all doing our best to act the
part of ninja, so I wanted to see if
I could learn any tips from them!$k$pIgrene and Shamir are more mature,
so they have more...style? Is that the
right word? Oh! Mystique!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|...What are you getting at, exactly?$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|Well, have you SEEN the outfit
Kagero is wearing? Come ON! I know
light clothing is good for stealth, but...$k$pI'm convinced a ninja's mystique is
part of what makes them so effective!
They throw their target off, and BAM!$k$pBut I don't know the first thing about
maintaining a layer of mystique!
I thought I could learn from them...$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|Uh-huh... Dare I ask what you were
hoping to learn?$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|Even if it's not something I can
master right away, that won't stop
me from training as hard as I can!$k$pOoh, wait! I've got the perfect thing!
Why don't we specialize as a ninja
duo—like a team!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|What do you mean? Specialize how?$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|You distract the target with some
ninja mystique, and then I'll swoop
in and knock them out cold!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|Now, hold on! You think I know
anything about "mystique"?! I've
never been a ninja before either!$k$p$nMPID_エリーゼ|That's what the training is for! There
is only one way to learn... Just watch
Igrene and Shamir closely!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_エリーゼ,ch05_19_Kamui_FF_Pair,Face|All right, let's get started... Just pick
out someone who looks like an easy
mark, and say hi!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|I'm still not so sure this is the best
idea, but...here goes nothing...$k$p*ahem*$k$pOh! Um... H-hello! How are...you?$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Ninja21,Face|Hello... Is there something I can...
help you with?$k$p$WmMPID_比翼カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, no, not exactly... I just thought
I recognized you from somewhere.$k$pActually...now that I've had a look
at you up close, you look a bit more
familiar than I had originally thought...$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Ninja21,Face|Yes... It is a bit strange, isn't it?
It feels almost as if we've met
somewhere before...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_比翼カムイ女,ch05_19_Kamui_FF_Pair,Face|I didn't expect to meet a version
of me from another world...let alone
one that's a man.$k$p$WmMPID_忍者カムイ男,ch05_00_Kamui_M_Ninja21,Face|It's definitely a bit shocking, at least
you still get along with your siblings!$k$pOh, Elise... As upbeat as ever, I see.$k$p$WmMPID_エリーゼ,ch05_19_Kamui_FF_Pair,Face|Well, I love having big sisters, and
big brothers are great too! So why
not one Corrin of each?$k$pWait! We're losing focus... We're here
to train our ninja skills, not talk about
family drama!$k$p$nMPID_比翼カムイ女|Oh, right... Of course.$k$p$Sbs150|
